document_data.name: House Norjah
document_data.mainbody:
'''House Norjah''' was a noble house in the city of [[Airspur]] whose mansion was located in Airspur's south-facing cliffs.{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies|2221}} The house was most notable for being almost entirely composed of [[vampires]].{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies|4298}}

House Norjah managed to acquire seven of the twenty-two [[Whispering Children]] artifacts. In [[1479 DR]], the [[genasi]] [[Riltana]] stole one of the Whispering Children and Lord [[Kasdrian]] sent vampiric [[assassin]]s after her although they eventually reached a truce.{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies|2397}}
document_data.Notable Members:
*'''Kasdrian''' - Leader of the house
*'''Lady Ascension''' - Member of the Rune Court
